CustomField.formula: IF( Image__c != "", LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + 'servlet/servlet.FileDownload?file=' + Image__c,IF( (Image_URL__c != "" && Image__c == ""), Image_URL__c,'https://s3.amazonaws.com/rcgidoimages/CG/noImage.png'))
CustomField.label: purl
